title: CREAM
subtitle: Mobile Application
description: With CREAM people can request one-of-a-kind video messages created by musicians, actors, entertainers, creators, and many more. Celebrities create 30-60 sec CREAM video messages for their fans. I developed the CREAM android, IOS mobile application using react native and published on the market. Currently, I am responsible for continues integration of this project.
duty: Native component to trim videos in android and swift
Video processing such as trimming, compressing and watermark using FFMPEG library

title: CREAM
subtitle: Web Application
description: I developed the CREAM web application using React.

title: lendpinoy
subtitle: Mobile Application
description: lendpinoy is a micro-lending service through mobile application based on artificial intelligence that has been tested and proven successful in other parts of the globe
duty: Show the nearest branches react-native-map, geolocation

title: Electronic
subtitle: Voting Systems
description: Implementing election system demonstration applications developed specifically for Ecuador, Kenya, Argentina, Congo, Philippines, Russia, Fiji and Iran.
duty: Hardware control like scanner, thermal printer, fingerprint reader, NFC reader

title: South Korean
subtitle: Electors Registration System
description: I was a part of team that developed client application of “South Korean Electors Registration System”.
duty: Hardware control like fingerprint readers, ID card scanner and smartcard readers

title: Mongolian National Assembly's
subtitle: Conference System
description: Mongolian National Assembly's “Electronic Conference System” created with the support of KOICA. I got an opportunity to work at this project while studying my MS. I was developing RESTful server at first. But I became responsible for the entire system to solve issues discovered during the test operation in Mongolia and completed project successfully on time. After this project I promoted for full-time job at the company that managed “Mongolian Assembly Conference System” project and worked for 3+ years.
duty: Android client applications for conference operators, chairman and congressmen
Serial communication with Bosch's conference system

title: HiVAMS Hyundai's
subtitle: Vessel Asset Management System
description: HiVAMS is a ship asset management system designed for efficient management of overall operations including supply, maintenance work, purchase management, stock, and cost management by assigning codes to all equipment and facilities on board. I pioneered in “Computer Science” laboratory at first year of University of Ulsan, which was the first case that freshman has worked in a laboratory in the University of Ulsan. I was given an opportunity to be part of team that developed “Hyundai” heavy industry’s “HiVAMS” vessel asset management system project.
